mapper.select: SELECT CTN, TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS transactionDt, TO_CHAR(CANCEL_NOTIFICATION_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS cancelNotificationDt, TOTAL, ITEMNAME, MERCHANTNAME FROM TB_AUTH_INFO WHERE PARTITION_ID IN (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(#{startDate}, 5, 2)) - 1, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(#{endDate}, 5, 2)) - 1) AND TRANSACTION_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND CTN = ${ctn} ORDER BY TRANSACTION_DT
